title.narrative: Productive Work for Youth in Armenia # supporting young entrepreneurs

description.narrative: In line with MDG1, the UNIDO mandate Poverty Reduction through Productive Activities and the MTPF 2010-13 programmatic enhancement # Measures to reduce youth unemployment#, the overall objective of this project is to support youth-led enterprise creation and expansion, thus promoting sound development of the local private sector. The project aims to demonstrate that youth are credit worthy and capable of turning loans into profitable businesses. The unemployment rate of youth (15-24 years old) has risen to a percentage of 38.8% in 2010. Hence, tackling youth unemployment remains a serious challenge to Armenia#s socio-economic development. Youth entrepreneurship is a feasible option to create employment, taking into account the limited absorptive capacity of labour markets in Armenia. Therefore, responding to government priorities and taking into consideration the findings and recommendations of the MDG Acceleration Framework (MAF), the project will support young women, men and families in creating or developing their own business. The project follows a comprehensive approach providing non-financial and financial services and support beyond the start-up phase, and also promoting a more conducive environment particularly for youth-led businesses. In addition, there is a focus on innovative, growth-oriented busine
